quote.msg:
岩岩到東京第三日
隔離好悶
好想快啲出街感受下個天氣

replies.msg:
黎緊我都要係酒店住足15晚
明明租左屋都唔比番屋企, 多謝學校

I've been to many countries on vacation. I'd always thought that many other countries were better than Hong Kong but after I vacationed in these countries, I realized that in terms of city life, night life, food and shopping, Hong Kong really is the best. In Europe, shops close at four on weekdays and don't open at all on weekends except for big cities like London where shops close at six on weekdays and four on the weekends. Their main sorts of entertainment are pubs and clubs. Las Vegas has spectacular night views but it was primarily built for tourism. It's famous for gambling, unique hotel design and shows like boxing events. However, in terms of scenery, Scandinavia and Tibet are the most ravishing. Tibet is famous for its breathtaking scenery at high altitude. Xinjiang is also a place of outstanding scenic beauty. If you think you might have altitude sickness, such as headaches, dizziness or trouble sleeping, I suggest bringing some medicine along. Besides, my friend who's been to the Mount Everest base camp showed me his photos taken there by which I was awesteuck. It's definitely a glamorous vacation destination. A tour of the Mount Everest base camp would be a once in a lifetime experience. Tibet is also the best place for stargazing as it's much closer to the heavens than any other places on earth and the sky at night is often clear and cloudless. It has some of the highest lakes in the world that are rich with fish and other marine life and the surrounding countryside is inhabited by flocks of yellow ducks and wild horses as well as donkeys. The lakes there, such as Lake Paiku which is four thousand five hundred ninety two meters above sea level, reflect the beauty of the stars, giving a double view of the sky at night. You can even set up camp there to get the best view of the stars and the Milky Way galaxy.

replies.msg:
敷金 / 敷金 / 敷金 / 火災保險 只係第一個月要俾
首次課金你預大概月租 4~5倍 (即月租 7萬, 第一次要俾 35萬)

第二個月開始淨俾屋租就OK, 10萬以內大把選擇

通常兩年約, 兩年後續約要俾 續約費 + 火災保險

如果間屋免敷金敷金敷金... 我勸你唔好租, 因為應該有D嘢

replies.msg:
搵屋好有學問
1/ 大部分都唔租俾外國人，可以揀既單位得好少
2/ 要考慮同車站距離, 駅徒步10分鐘 / 巴士10分鐘 / 巴士+徒步10分鐘 價錢都會爭一截
3/ 踩唔踩單車, 踩單車記得要租有單車位的單位
4/ 最後揀1981/1982 年之後的單位, 因為1981年6月開始有新耐震基準

如果租一兩年就算, 建議租包埋傢私電器果D, 因為日本棄置垃圾要另外俾錢
買平家電冇問題, 到時棄置都係要俾錢
